publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3537 Donald Gorrie: Tourism Information for People with Disabilities—That the Parliament urges VisitScotland to respond to the report by Capability Scotland An Open or Shut Case? - How Scotland meets the needs of disabled tourists by taking action to remedy the defect which the report identifies in the system for informing people with disabilities about the many facilities which are suitable for them.
S1M-3537 Tourism Information for People with Disabilities (lodged on 5 November 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3537 Tourism Information for People with Disabilities (lodged on 5 November 2002) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-3537 Donald Gorrie: Tourism Information for People with Disabilities—That the Parliament urges VisitScotland to respond to the report by Capability Scotland An Open or Shut Case? - How Scotland meets the needs of disabled tourists by taking action to remedy the defect which the report identifies in the system for informing people with disabilities about the many facilities which are suitable for them.Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White
S1M-3537 Tourism Information for People with Disabilities (lodged on 5 November 2002) Robert Brown*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3537 Tourism Information for People with Disabilities (lodged on 5 November 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3537 Tourism Information for People with Disabilities (lodged on 5 November 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3537 Tourism Information for People with Disabilities (lodged on 5 November 2002) Johann Lamont*
S1M-3537 Tourism Information for People with Disabilities (lodged on 5 November 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3537 Tourism Information for People with Disabilities (lodged on 5 November 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
